languages.text: "Наша трехглазая куколка, Кассия... ее тоже забрали, со мной. По крайней мере, ее тело — она не двигалась, не говорила, ничего".
"Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."
languages.original_text: "Наша трехглазая куколка, Кассия... ее тоже забрали, со мной. По крайней мере, ее тело — она не двигалась, не говорила, ничего".

traits.locale_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least — she wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、三つ目の人形カシア…彼らは彼女のことも私と一緒にさらったわ。少なくとも彼女の体は一緒だった。彼女は動きも、話しもしなかった」
languages.original_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、三つ目の人形カシア…彼らは彼女のことも私と一緒にさらったわ。少なくとも彼女の体は一緒だった。彼女は動きも、話しもしなかった」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我们的三眼小公主，卡西娅……他们把她和我一起带走了。她现在还在那里，一动不动，不说话，什么反应都没有。”
languages.original_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."

traits.locale_text: “我们的三眼小公主，卡西娅……他们把她和我一起带走了。她现在还在那里，一动不动，不说话，什么反应都没有。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Nuestra muñeca de tres ojos, Cassia... se la llevaron también conmigo. Su cuerpo estaba allí, al menos. No se movía, ni hablaba, ni nada».
languages.original_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra muñeca de tres ojos, Cassia... se la llevaron también conmigo. Su cuerpo estaba allí, al menos. No se movía, ni hablaba, ni nada».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Unsere dreiäugige Puppe, Cassia ... sie haben sie auch verschleppt, zusammen mit mir. Zumindest war ihr Körper hier. Sie hat nicht bewegt, nicht geredet, gar nichts."
languages.original_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere dreiäugige Puppe, Cassia ... sie haben sie auch verschleppt, zusammen mit mir. Zumindest war ihr Körper hier. Sie hat nicht bewegt, nicht geredet, gar nichts."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Notre poupée à trois yeux, Cassia... Ils l'ont emmenée avec moi. Son corps, tout du moins. Elle ne bougeait pas, ne parlait pas, rien... »
languages.original_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."

traits.locale_text: « Notre poupée à trois yeux, Cassia... Ils l'ont emmenée avec moi. Son corps, tout du moins. Elle ne bougeait pas, ne parlait pas, rien... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Üç gözlü güzelimiz Cassia... Benimle birlikte onu da alıp götürdüler. En azından bedenen yanımdaydı. Ne hareket etti ne de konuştu."
languages.original_text: "Our three-eyed doll, Cassia... they took her too, along with me. Her body was there, at least. She wasn't moving, wasn't talking, nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Üç gözlü güzelimiz Cassia... Benimle birlikte onu da alıp götürdüler. En azından bedenen yanımdaydı. Ne hareket etti ne de konuştu."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
